cause.description:
Are you tired of knowing the blood of innocent children is dripping from your finger tips? Do you want to see a more humane way of decorating your person? If so, join our cause in eliminating the deaths of thousands of innocent African children. Boycott diamonds today, so that a child can live tomorrow!
1. Children have the right to a happy and healthy childhood.
2. The rich are NOT to take advantage of the poor.
3. Education of the consumer is neccessary - would you buy a diamond if you knew little Kunta's entire family died for your bling?
cause.mission: To sensitize the public, and other gulliable wanna-be blingers and newly engaged couples on the dangers of "a girl's best-friend."
cause.name: Fight Against Diamond Mongering
